aboutUs.heading: About Us
aboutUs.subheading: About the founders of Shadow And Sillage

content.subheading: Two collectors chasing the scent of something rare
content.one: The city sleeps, but somewhere in the dark, a couple sits beneath the warm hum of a desk lamp. Bottles line the shelves like suspects waiting to be questioned — amber glass, faded labels, whispers of other lives. That’s where you’ll find us: Brian and Amanda, the husband-and-wife team behind Shadow and Sillage.
content.two: It started simply enough - one perfume too many to remember, one story too good to lose. We began keeping notes, first on scraps of paper, then in a ledger, and finally in this growing archive. What began as a way to track our collection became something larger: a gathering place for others who chase memories through scent.
content.three: This little speakeasy of fragrance runs on curiosity. Every new listing is a lead, every review a clue. The database grows quietly in the background, one house and one scent at a time, as we piece together the strange and beautiful puzzle of perfume. You might call it obsession; we call it devotion.
content.four: We built this place for the romantics and the detectives of scent — the ones who can find memory in a base note or joy in a single spark of aldehyde. If you notice a bottle missing from our shelves, you can send word through the forms scattered around the site. We’ll take the tip, follow the trail, and add it to the case file.
content.five: The door’s always open. Step in from the rain, hang your coat, and stay awhile. In Shadow and Sillage, every scent has a story, and every story deserves to be found.

gist.heading: THE GIST
gist.contentOne: Shadow and Sillage is an independent platform devoted to perfume lovers — a place to share reviews, learn, and connect with other collectors. Users may list perfumes and samples for trade, but the dealings themselves are strictly between private individuals.
gist.contentTwo: We do not handle payments, do not verify authenticity, and will not mediate disputes. Think of us as the smoke-filled bar where introductions are made, not the broker of the deal.

tradingAndListing.heading: TRADING AND LISTING
tradingAndListing.contentOne: Trades and exchanges are entirely at your own risk.
tradingAndListing.contentThree: Split (decanted) perfumes are permitted, provided they are genuine and accurately described.
tradingAndListing.contentFour: Any attempt to defraud, misrepresent, or sell stolen goods will result in permanent account removal and possible reporting to relevant authorities.
tradingAndListing.contentFive: Users must describe items truthfully — if you’re listing a vintage bottle, say so; if the label’s half gone, that’s part of its story.

accountsAndConduct.heading: ACCOUNTS AND USER CONDUCT
accountsAndConduct.contentOne: You’ll need an account to post reviews, notes, or trades. Browsing and searching are open to everyone.
accountsAndConduct.contentTwo: Keep it civil: no harassment, spam, political or religious debates, or illegal content.
accountsAndConduct.contentThree: This is a perfume community, not a soapbox or battleground. Treat others with the respect you’d show in a high-end fragrance boutique.

reviewsAndNotes.heading: REVIEWS AND NOTES
reviewsAndNotes.contentOne: Users may submit perfume reviews or leave notes on discussions to help others navigate their scent journeys.
reviewsAndNotes.contentTwo: All content goes through a moderation process to ensure it’s relevant, fair, and on-topic. We reserve the right to remove or edit submissions that break these rules or drift into unrelated territory.
reviewsAndNotes.contentThree: By posting, you grant Shadow and Sillage the non-exclusive right to display your words and images on the site and in related features (such as listings or community highlights). You retain full ownership of your work.

noGuarantee.heading: NO GUARANTEES
noGuarantee.contentOne: We strive to keep the site polished and running, but we make no promises of uninterrupted service. We may suspend, modify, or remove features without warning — sometimes even good things must fade to make room for the new.

liability.heading: LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
liability.contentOne: Shadow and Sillage and its operators are not responsible for any loss, damage, or dispute arising from user trades, communications, or listings.
liability.contentTwo: If a deal goes sour, it’s between the parties involved. The platform merely sets the stage — the drama belongs to you.

privacy.heading: PRIVACY POLICY
privacy.contentOne: We respect your privacy as much as a perfumer guards a secret formula. Here’s how we handle your data:

contentList.one: Information Collected: We may collect basic account information (such as username, email, and preferences) to help personalize your experience and improve the site.
contentList.two: Use of Data: Data is used internally only — for recommendations, feature improvements, and fraud prevention. It is never sold, never shared with advertisers, and never used for resale or marketing beyond this site.
contentList.three: Cookies: Like many websites, we use cookies to remember your session and keep you logged in.
contentList.four: Security: We take reasonable steps to protect your data, but no system is impenetrable. Handle your account credentials as carefully as you’d handle your favorite perfume bottle.
contentList.five: Contact: For questions, data requests, or to report suspicious activity, reach us at [INSERT CONTACT EMAIL HERE].

changes.heading: CHANGES TO THIS POLICY
changes.contentOne: We may revise these Terms and this Privacy Policy from time to time. Updates will be posted on this page with a new “last updated” date. Continuing to use the site after changes means you accept them — the way one accepts that the night always carries a hint of mystery.

closing.heading: CLOSING WORDS
closing.contentOne: Shadow and Sillage exists to celebrate the art, science, and stories behind scent. Use it wisely, trade fairly, and remember — trust your nose, not a stranger’s promises.
